prompt:
Please answer my code questions using the given API following this format: <<>>: $API <<>>: $CODE <<>>: $EXPLANATION. Question: How can I calculate the sum of an array in Java? Please using this api: Arrays.stream. Answer:<<>>: Arrays.stream <<>>: int[] array = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}; int sum = Arrays.stream(array).sum(); <<>>: The sum() method of the IntStream class returns the sum of elements in this stream. This is a special case of a reduction. This is a terminal operation. Question: How to read file from end to start (in reverse order) in Java?: :I want to read file in opposite direction from end to the start my file,[1322110800] LOG ROTATION: DAILY[1322110800] LOG VERSION: 2.0[1322110800] CURRENT HOST STATE:arsalan.hussain;DOWN;HARD;1;CRITICAL - Host Unreachable (192.168.1.107)[1322110800] CURRENT HOST STATE: localhost;UP;HARD;1;PING OK - Packet loss = 0%, RTA = 0.06 ms[1322110800] CURRENT HOST STATE: musewerx-72c7b0;UP;HARD;1;PING OK - Packet loss = 0%, RTA = 0.27 msi use code to read it in this way,String strpath="/var/nagios.log";FileReader fr = new FileReader(strpath);BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(fr);String ch;int time=0;String Conversion="";do { ch = br.readLine(); out.print(ch+"
"); } while (ch != null);fr.close();I would prefer to read in reverse order using buffer reader Please using this api: RandomAccessFile.read. Answer:
response:
<<>>: RandomAccessFile.read <<>>: RandomAccessFile raf = new RandomAccessFile("nagios.log", "r"); int time=0; String Conversion=""; do { String ch = raf.readLine(); out.print(ch+"
"); } while (ch != null); raf.close(); <<>>: The read() method of the RandomAccessFile class reads the contents of the file starting at the current position and returns a String.
